title: Question: What happened to chat rooms/general discussion
body:
I cant seem to find it.... Has it become permanently removed after new client?...Or  is there like a secret club where everyone hangs out in and I don't know about xD

-etav

replies.body: they haven't added it and i don't think it's a priority of riot atm
they got removed with the new client I think.

> [{quoted}](name=A steezy Scizor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7ImopJIo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-25T05:53:35.683+0000)
>
> they got removed with the new client I think.

It's a secret club.

EDIT: Oh, sh!t. I think I said too much...
